channel.title: NPC text Editing?
channel.description:
[quote author=Pur3 L0v3 link=topic=440265.msg3235014#msg3235014 date=1276397360] How do I edit this? Well the text above the NPCs'?
Link to source and client: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,433417.msg3182266.html#msg3182266
I've gone into the NPCHandler.Java file and couldn't edit it to were they wouldn't speak pretty much. Another other ideas on how to disable this?
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/nmyfsx.png[/img]

item.title: NPC text Editing?
item.dc:creator: @warouxriot warouxriot
item.description:
@warouxriot wrote:

Me guess would be NPCoption or NPCoption1, that may be for 508’s but try it.

Read full topic
